messages.text: Updated room membership.
Space Updated
Hello team.  Did I get the name right?

Group guidelines: This is a school administrated space provided for direct communication between the representatives of the MateROV team and the program coaches for the duration of the 24-25. ¬†
Please use this space respectfully and proactively, to facilitate agreements, reports and communication in general between your coaches and your team. ¬†Only 2 members of the team are added to this groups as the responsible ones for handling communication. ¬†It is your responsibility to replicate this information to the rest of your team whenever appropriate.
As per discussed in our last meeting, Shiva and Ahmed will be the representatives for your team.
In other news: 28 items have been purchased üò≥... I'll keep you updated once I start hearing about import fees.

If you haven't: please make sure to sign up for discourse so you can get updates, and ask questions about competition rules when needed: https://materovcomp.discourse.group/login

url_metadata.title: MATE ROV Competition Forum Board - The MATE ROV Competition Forum Board is a website dedicated to Q&A for the MATE ROV Competition. Participants may ask technical questions about the mission tasks, rules, specifications, and ask general questions about the competition in general. MATE ROV Competition staff will respond and answer questions posted to the forum board.
url_metadata.snippet: The MATE ROV Competition Forum Board is a website dedicated to Q&A for the MATE ROV Competition.  Participants may ask technical questions about the mission tasks, rules, specifications, and ask general questions about the competition in general.  MATE ROV Competition staff will respond and answer questions posted to the forum board.

messages.text:
Hello MateROvers,

Looking forward to our meeting this afternoon. ¬†Please note that we have a group of students who are interested in joining MateROV during the second semester. ¬†I need to have 2 representatives from each team present at 3:15 pm today so you can interview the potential new members and allow them the possibility to learn about your team, and any current needs you see in improving the team. ¬†Hopefully their skillset and your team needs will match in which case you are welcome to offer them a position AFTER GETTING FULL APPROVAL FROM YOUR TEAM.

Potential new MateROV members:
- Interviews will happen today 3:15 on the DOT!
- All CEOs should communicate with Ms Arora and Ms Tellez about their decision for each of the candidates by Sunday Feb 15 12:00 noon.
- New potential members will be allocated a team based on their preference and the offers received.

A big thank you to those of you who are part of MUN and have responsibly notified of your absence today as appropriate. ¬†If you are part of MUN and have not communicated, please know that communication is the number 1 skill in diplomacy! you should be portraying it proudly.
Hi Ms Tellez
Me, Shiva and Ati are away today
for MUN
I need two people from your team at 3:15.  Who are you making responsible for interviewing new candidates?
communicating with them right now
Hello can I please get a written update on the result of your interviews with the 6 candidates?  I'll appreciate it if I can receive it before noon so we can communicate with them
Miss none of the other 3 candidates set a meeting with us
I was under the impression from your email that they are the ones who should reach out
well, you can too! is ok..
you guys are the most understaffed team, I would highly suggest you to get to an agreement to at least take 1-2 more members out of the 6 wishing to join
what about the 3 you did interview?

Dean Todorov
Document writing¬†
Materov last year (ceo last year)
Frame building¬†
Following guidelines¬†
Meetings¬†

Shashwat Saxnea¬†
Operating 3D printer
Bambu labs PCL¬†
Not that great at CAD but ok
Really good at working in a team


Roji
Mechanical and electrical (allegedly built most of the ROV)
Pufferfish¬†
Can use fusion
please reach out to the others, and let me know if you guys see any fits in your team.
Sure we will reach out
But so far, we are not really seeing any place where these members can fit into our team
open your minds.... I know you are comfortable with the people you are working with, but you are missing out
If it comes to a situation where we have to we have priorities, but if it was up to us we have a consensus that we wouldn't want to take anyone
I understand miss I'll try and get everyone together during today's meeting and have another discussion

quoted_message_metadata.text: open your minds.... I know you are comfortable with the people you are working with, but you are missing out

messages.text: Miss I think it really boils down to two points

quoted_message_metadata.text: open your minds.... I know you are comfortable with the people you are working with, but you are missing out

messages.text: The first being it‚Äôs too late into the season, we don‚Äôt feel it would be fair for someone to join this late and not put in the same amount of hours as but potentially receive the same prize/recognition

And secondly it‚Äôs the team dynamic, our team has evolved in such a way that we comfortable with assigning tasks to each other without the need for additional support hence we feel it was be inefficient and ineffective to take upon another member
However as Ahmed said, we‚Äôll take this into consideration

quoted_message_metadata.text: I understand miss I'll try and get everyone together during today's meeting and have another discussion

messages.text: Hello guys.  Reminder meeting today is 2:15.  We can only stay until 3:30 today!  Please make sure to share this with your team.
Hi, can I get more info on the event this weekend?
What do we need to prepare?
We are getting trash bags and gloves but some extra would be great
And also maybe some trash grabbers
How are we getting those? from where?
If you have the grabbers it would be nice miss
Who is attending? you guys are making an open invitation? if so, we cannot let people participate with proper equipment.
But we are supplying the trash bags and gloves
I don't. Not part of the normal comp sci teacher equipment üòÇ
Fair enough miss
I'll ask around
You guys mention first aid kits and trained adults... can I have more info on that?
But if not then gloves are a good alternative
Yes so basically

quoted_message_metadata.text: You guys mention first aid kits and trained adults... can I have more info on that?

messages.text: We are doing this with the boy scouts
So that's where they come from
who is coming from the boy scouts? who is the adult supporting? do you guys have an estimate idea of how many people might join? I just want to make sure we have enough and proper supervision
Okay I'll double check on that
I have 3 sets of gloves and bags (the ones from my family) that's all ü´§
thanks
So from the boy scouts we have two members
And actually no supervisors
You are the only supervisor
And potentially Mrs Erickson
I hope it's okay with <20 people
I think the rest of us can supply everyone miss

quoted_message_metadata.text: I don't. Not part of the normal comp sci teacher equipment üòÇ

messages.text: I think we need to secure another adult.  specially if this is combined between mate and boy scouts, because you guys are promising a first aid trained person... so i am surprised you are promising that if you cannot deliver... I can happily supervise the team (only) doing a beach clean, but an open invitation with first aid promised, I cannot commit to supervise that by myself
Ms apparently David is first aid trained as a part of boy scouts
As well as Brayden from boy scouts
We have 12 likes, 6 from the team, so I am a bit nervous about getting a bunch of random people coming with me as the responsible for the safety of everyone
who are the 2 people attending from bs? Brayden and?
Ronan
your post is promising a lot of stuff that is not ready üò•üò•
But miss we are providing the water, sunscreen, cleaning supplies and first aid trained scouts

you have an open invitation that literally says:  trash bags, gloves and tools provided, first aid kits (do you have those? plural?), adult supervisors (plural), water and sunscreen (you have water and sunscreen for whoever shows up?
You guys missed to communicate this with me.  I was under the understanding that it was ROVolution going to clean the beach, not me supervising an unknown number of people.

I keep playing catch up with you guys, and containing your plans, and it is getting tiresome to be an obstacle.... we are here to facilitate, but you guys want to act on your own, no consultation, no planning, no structure, and that make things very difficult.
Can you guys please come early tomorrow before first block so we can discuss this? I think is urgent we get to an agreement...
Okay miss sorry for miscommunicating this

quoted_message_metadata.text: You guys missed to communicate this with me.  I was under the understanding that it was ROVolution going to clean the beach, not me supervising an unknown number of people.

messages.text: Maybe we can have a sign up form for more transparency
Okay sure

quoted_message_metadata.text: Can you guys please come early tomorrow before first block so we can discuss this? I think is urgent we get to an agreement...

messages.text: Before you guys go crazy again, please don't do anything else until we agree on something tomorrow is that ok?
Okay sure ms tellez
Updated room membership.

Good morning team, I've added the rest of the members of the team to this chat temporarily so we can have a more clear communication.  Normally only 2 members of the team are in charge of communication between advisors and the team, but we believe is best if we have clear and direct communication with all of you while the new team is settled.
Welcome to the 5 new members first of all.

Second of all:  We had a beach clean scheduled for tomorrow 1:30 PM since several weeks ago.  It was my understanding that this was a ROVolution activity, so that only team members were involved.  I was worried when I didn't hear anything about the planning for this event by Tuesday, and therefore brought to your attention.  The only information that was provided to me or to Ms Arora as advisors of the team, was an Instagram post advertising an event that promises a couple of things that need to be carefully considered and planned

1. open invitation without registration: which means an unknown groups of minors will be under the responsibility of only one adult for a school related event (since is being sponsored and organized by Rovolution.
2. The post implies that materials will be provided which have not been secured (bags, gloves, tools, sunscreen, water, first aid kits)
3. The post promises the supervision of more than one adult, and only one (myself) has been confirmed.

4. In conversation with Mr Remington as representative of the Boy Scouts (which for what I heard last minute are working in combination with you guys), mentioned today, that he is concerned about requiring any authorization on behalf of the university.  I am not even sure if this is the case or who to approach.

I had a conversation with Shiva and Ahmed early this morning, and given that the conditions above are not ready, Mr. Remington, Ms Arora and myself have requested that you guys work together to ensure the following conditions by 2:00 pm today in order to move along with the plan:
1. a sign up with the exact number of people attending,¬†
2. the promised materials available for the number of people involved,¬†
3. an adult confirmed for every 10 students attending,¬†

We agreed that if these three items are not ready by 2 pm, the best course of action would be to postpone the event until you guys can work together to plan properly and get ready to actually deliver what you are promising.  

I strongly suggest you rethink your timeline, and make sure to plan ahead.  I believe the authorization piece that Mr. Remington mentioned to the boy scouts before, should also be considered.

I am available today during lunch (12:25), if you guys want to get together.  I would actually love it if we can have a team meeting, either today or early next week, as there are other aspects of the new team that might be important to clarify between advisors and team.
My core meeting just got cancelled in case you want to meet
I have not heard anything from any of you.  Can I assume this is not happening? can someone please post a cancellation/postpone on instagram then.
Miss we just need a bit of time to get all the responses on the form as people have been busy and scattered
We will get it to you soon
We asked for very specific items to be completed by 2 pm for a reason.  From the Boys scouts side Mr Remington is suggesting a rescheduling, I've suggested the same.
Please reschedule for a time when the plan is clear.  If materov is to be involved, Mr Leeper needs to be informed, and risk management needs to happen before.
With the school day over, now we cannot get any of it sorted.  I suggested core and lunch and didn't hear from you. Mr Leeper was also available during lunch to support you
unfortunately that didn't happen, so let's plan for another weekend and lets get a plan in place
Hello‚Ä¶ can someone post a note informing the beach cleaning will be postponed please?
Hi Ms Tellez, sorry for the late reply. We will not be proceeding with the beach cleanup and aim to communicate with you next week about how we should proceed.
Noted, thank you‚Ä¶ your followers in instagram need to be informed as well‚Ä¶
